text: Wo que yi ping mingzheng paiqian wo de shizhemen, bing sui tamen yidao jiang shile jingdian he zhunze [gongzheng], yibian renmen zhuchi gongdao. Wo jiangxia tie [zhu], tie [zai zhanzheng zhong] liliang da, tongshi, dui renlei hai you xuduo yichu, yibian an la zhidao shei zai anzhong yuanzhu ta [de yisilan jiao] ji qi shizhemen. An la que shi zui qiang da de, quanneng de.
